thread.title: Swift's boyfriend to sue over breakup rumors?
thread.title_full: Swift's boyfriend to sue over breakup rumors?

title: Swift's boyfriend to sue over breakup rumors?
text:
Love is still real. (Photo: Kevin Mazur/BMA2015, WireImage)
10 CONNECT 21 TWEET LINKEDIN 2 COMMENT EMAIL MORE In case you missed Monday's Twitter meltdown, major heartbreak occurred when Taylor Swift broke up with her boyfriend, Calvin Harris.
Except that didn't happen, according to her best friend and #squad member, Selena Gomez.
Gomez, on a promo tour for her new album, Revival , was asked about tabloid rumors that Harris allegedly cheated on Swift at a Los Angeles massage parlor, spurring her to call the whole thing off. Gomez shot it down on SiriusXM's Andy Cohen Live on Monday.
"I think I would have found that out. Is that a rumor?" she said. The tabloid rumor mill is just dumb, Gomez added. "Honestly, it's so stupid. I'm pregnant every week, (Taylor's) gonna be pregnant. It's so stupid, like you can't really read that stuff."
Some fans had other ideas about rumor patrol.
@taylorswift13 @CalvinHarris POST A SELFIE POST A SELFIE POST A SELFIE POST A SELFIE POST A SELFIE POST A SELFIE get married POST A SELFIE
â€” paula (@swiftxforever) October 12, 2015 Harris wasn't taking it as lightly, implying on Twitter that he is suing mad about rumors he paid for a sexual service.
"It's not going to be a 'happy ending' for everyone I sue for defamation of character for all these bull--- stories bye bye," he tweeted Monday.
Swift hasn't tweeted anything about the alleged break-up. Perhaps she'll just let her new Vogue Australia cover do the talking?
